name: nextjs-sanity-template
description: A production-ready Next.js + Sanity CMS website factory with CMS-driven pages, SEO, PWA, and legal compliance.

scripts.build: pnpm run typegen && pnpm run format && pnpm run lint:check && next build
scripts.typegen: pnpx sanity@latest schema extract --path=schema.json && pnpm run typegen:generate
scripts.validate:md: find . -name '*.md' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -path './.git/*' -exec echo 'Checking {}' \; -exec markdownlint {} \; || echo 'Markdown validation completed'
scripts.check:plan: echo 'Checking plan progress...' && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); try { const plan=fs.readFileSync('PLAN.md','utf8'); console.log('PLAN.md found and readable'); } catch(e) { console.log('PLAN.md not found or unreadable'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.update:docs: echo 'Updating documentation...' && node -e "console.log('Documentation update simulation - implement based on your specific needs');"
scripts.commit:rules: pnpm run typegen && pnpm run validate:md && pnpm run check:plan && pnpm run update:docs && pnpm run format && pnpm run lint:check && pnpm run build && echo 'All commit rules completed successfully!'
